page.title: 15SHILLINGFORD-TRANSPORT
page.content: IN SHILLINGFORD ST.GEORGE THERE ARE TWO BUSES A DAY.THE BUS COMES FROM EXETER AND GOES BACK TO EXETER ALL IN ONE TRIP. THERE IS A BUS IN THE MORNING AND ONE IN THE AFTERNOON.THE PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE SAY THAT THERE SHOULD BE MORE BUSES. MOST OF THE PEOPLE HAVE THEIR ONE CARS. THERE IS ALSO A SCHOOL BUS THAT PICKS UP THE CHILDREN EACH MORNING AND DROPS THEM OFF AT NIGHT. THE PEOPLE WHO WORK IN EXETER DON'T CATCH THE BUS BECAUSE THE BUS DOESN'T LEAVE EARLY ENOUGH IN THE MORNING AND COMES BACK TOO EARLY AT NIGHT.
